summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from June 8, 2020, discussing the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and specifically referencing prosecutors in New York seeking to interview Prince Andrew. The email shows FBI personnel inquiring about updates on the investigation and coordination with U.S. authorities.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned as the individual whom prosecutors in New York have asked to speak to regarding the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: John
persons.context: Referenced by the email sender as someone from whom they have not heard regarding the investigation, indicating John was involved in or aware of planned discussions with U.S. authorities.

connections.description: Implied connection through the Epstein investigation, where John (FBI) was involved in coordination with U.S. authorities regarding speaking with Prince Andrew.

events.title: FBI email discussion on Prince Andrew interview request
events.description: Internal FBI emails discuss prosecutors in New York asking to interview Prince Andrew in the Epstein investigation, with inquiries about updates and coordination.

keyFacts: Prosecutors in New York had asked to interview Prince Andrew as part of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation as of June 2020.
The FBI was actively discussing updates and coordination regarding the Epstein investigation internally.
The email indicates planned discussions between 'SONY' (possibly a typo or reference to an entity/person) and U.S. authorities about the case.
